Package com.github.dsvalerian.chip8.data

Class MemoryBlock

java.lang.Object
com.github.dsvalerian.chip8.data.MemoryBlock
Direct Known Subclasses:
ROM
public class MemoryBlock extends Object
A block of memory representing an array of Bytes.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    MemoryBlock(int[] data, Bits registerSize)
    Construct a MemoryBlock from a data array, with each register capable of storing a specified number of bits.
    MemoryBlock(int size, Bits registerSize)
    Construct a MemoryBlock of a certain size, with each register capable of storing a specified number of bits.

  • Constructor Details

    • MemoryBlock

      public MemoryBlock(int size, Bits registerSize)
      Construct a MemoryBlock of a certain size, with each register capable of storing a specified number of bits.
      Parameters:
      size - Size of the memory block.
      registerSize - Size of each Register in the block.

    • MemoryBlock

      public MemoryBlock(int[] data, Bits registerSize)
      Construct a MemoryBlock from a data array, with each register capable of storing a specified number of bits.
      Parameters:
      data - The data array. Each element must be able to fit in a register.
      registerSize - Size of each Register in the block.

  • Method Details

    • read

      public int read(Register address)
      Read the value at a specified address.
      Parameters:
      address - A Register that is storing the address to get.
      Returns:
      The value at the address stored in the Register.

    • read

      public int read(int address)
      Read the value at a specified address.
      Parameters:
      address - The address to get the byte from.
      Returns:
      The value at the specified address.

    • set

      public void set(int address, Register value)
      Set a value at a specified address.
      Parameters:
      address - The address to set.
      value - A Register that is storing the value to set.

      public void set(Register address, int value)
      Set a value at a specified address.
      Parameters:
      address - A Register that is storing the address to set.
      value - The value to set.

    • getSize

      public int getSize()
      Get the size of the memory block.
      Returns:
